question_text: Which troubleshooting steps should you perform when experiencing a flashing or flickering screen? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Check video cable connections are tight and secure
Try swapping the video cable for a known good one
Test with a known good monitor
Verify OS display settings match monitor specifications
correct_answer: Check video cable connections are tight and secure
Try swapping the video cable for a known good one
Test with a known good monitor
Verify OS display settings match monitor specifications
explanation: Flashing screens require systematic troubleshooting: check cable connections, swap cables, test with known good hardware, and verify OS settings compatibility. Graphics card replacement should only be considered after other steps are exhausted.
